windows.ie: If you're using Internet Explorer on Windows, right-click on the main tabs bar, then make sure Favorites bar is selected.
windows.firefox: If you're using Firefox on Windows, look next to your Search bar for the bookmarks clipboard icon, click it, then navigate to Bookmarks Toolbar, then make sure View Bookmarks Toolbar is selected.
windows.chrome: If you're using Chrome on Windows, click the options icon to the right of your URL bar, select Bookmarks, then make sure Show bookmarks bar is selected.
